name: alrimii
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wal(s0, w1), wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)), wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))
-| wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)), wal(s0, w1))

|- wi(w0, wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)))

|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))

-| wnf(s1, w0)

stmt.origin: cbvalv1(s1, s0, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1)), wal(s0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))
-| wnf(s1, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w1))
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))

-| diffss(s1, s0)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))

-| wi(w0, w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w2)
-| wnf(s1, w1)

-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w1), w1))

|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w1))

comment: A lemma for introducing a universal quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
